message_form_placeholder: Example: 3 days ago, I started having a dull headache which I also feel behind my eyes. In addition to this, my nose is runny and I sometimes feel dizzy, especially in the evening. Iâ€™d like also to mention that I started having these symptoms after I returned from fishing. So far, the symptoms did not appear to get worse, but neither did they improve after I took Paracetamol and Nurofen. I have not done any medical investigation in this regard and I do not have other chronic diseases. Note that I`m also a smoker.
